A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Storyline was disjointed.  Left many things not explained. All the trials and tribulations to be trained by a master jedi and Rey just picks it up with hardly talking to Luke.  Had high hopes for this trilogy.  I don't think it can recover.  At this point\, the episodes 1-3 might be about as good as these.  Those got better as they went along.  I think the spinoff movies might just be better this time around.
